The new Woolies app gives you easy access to fashion trends, recipes, stores, account information and so much more. See how much you’ve saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers. Conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more. Create a profile or use your existing Woolies online sign in to get started. Your sign in details will be the same on the app, mobi site and website. welcome WRewards at a glance Financial services GET STARTED km Search by Store or Location SKIP
continue cli-concluded CREDIT LIMIT INCREASE before we get started
Select your bank Other Expenses Monthly Credit Payments Maintenance Expenses Rental Payments Mortgage Payments Additional Monthly Income Net Monthly Income Gross Monthly Income YES No ACCOUNT TYPE LOADING… UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum GOT IT Gross monthly income refers to your income before deductions. Net monthly income refers to your income after deductions. Additional income refers to any income you receive apart from your monthly salary. Monthly mortgage or bond repayment refers to your home loan installments Rent is the cost of your monthly accommodation Maintenance expenses refer to your monthly obligation to pay for statutory child etc. Monthly Instalment of creditor account i.e: Credit Card, Personal Loan, Furniture Accounts etc. Other expenses refer to groceries, transport, costs etc. EMAIL SENT TO All fields are mandatory.\nIf not applicable, please enter R0.
UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED We can only continue with your application once you’ve granted us permission to access your consumer credit information.
SORRY, WE CANNOT PROCEED WITH YOUR APPLICATION Unfortunately we can’t proceed until you no longer have any of these conditions in place.

WELCOME WREWARDS AT A GLANCE FINANCIAL SERVICES CREATE A DIGITAL PROFILE get started Please ensure that you are connected \nto the internet. SUBMIT THIS FORM
My Details Profile Update Password
SESSION EXPIRED Your session expired. To continue please sign in or cancel to return to the rest of the app. sign in View Statements Balance Protection Insurance Balance Protection Insurance Overview Featured and Benefits Submit a Claim Critical Illness/Death Cover/Retrenchment etc. Submit a Claim
select your claim reason Death Cover Pays the outstanding balance on your account Retrenchment Pays up to 12 months of installments from first day of retrenchment. Temporary Disability Pays up to 12 months of installments from the first day of disability
Permanent Disability Pays the outstanding balance on your account
Critical Illness Pays the outstanding balance on your account. In order to process your claim we will need the following documents. required forms (available from woolworths financials solutions) IN ADDITION, YOU WILL ALSO NEED TO SUBMIT THE BELOW DOCUMENTS Balance Protection Claim Form New Disability Claim Form Confidential Medical Specialist Report Medical Reports from Doctor Death Certificate
Certified ID Certified ID Copy of next of Kin/Claimant Investigation Results from Doctor Retrenchment Form Certified ID Copy UI19 Form Certified Letter of Retrenchment from Employer Employee Declaration Form Sick Note from Doctor Personal Medical Attendants Report Boarding Letter from Employer balance insurance Get the documents Balance Insurance Overview
FEATURES AND BENEFITS Your peace of mind is important to us, so we offer you comprehensive balance protection on your Woolies Store Card, Credit Card or Personal Loan.
Comprehensive Balance Protection Your Comprehensive balance protection covers you in the event of death, retrenchment, critical illness, temporary and permanent disability. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death or permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months if you are retrenched or temporary disabled.
Additional Death Cover For an extra monthly premium of only R13.70 per month, you can also take out additional death benefit, which pays R20 000 to your next of kin in the event of your death, to help them handle unforeseen expenses.
Partner / Spouse Balance protection insurance for your spouse or partner can also be arranged. An additional monthly premium will be charged.
Withdraw Cash Now Debit Orders

Credit bureau We will try our best to ensure that you can afford the increased instalments of your new credit limit. As such we obtain your credit information from various credit bureaus, who maintains the personal details related to your credit history (repayment behaviour, amount of credit you have available, outstanding debt collections and other). Proof of income With credit applications, we may be required to verify your income. If so we may need 1 months payslip or bank statement.
Thanks for your application. Please check on the app to get regular updates as to your application progress. back to my account CONGRATULATIONS Your credit limit increase has been approved and is now available. Happy shopping! back to my account ### account type ### savings account
OOPS. SOMETHING WENT WRONG! Please try again. If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20 Check that your mobile data or WIFI is switched on and ensure that you’re connected to the internet. If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20 try again proof of income documents Take clear photos of your documents and email them to us at cliproofofincome@wfs.co.za. Your ID number will be your reference. Proof of income Requirements: In order to complete your application, we require your latest 1 months’ bank statements or last months payslips. Don’t have the required documents right now or need more detailed instructions? Simply click below and we will send an email to you, so you can complete the process documents sent to: Please follow the instructions we’ve sent to your email. If you didn’t receive the email, please check your spam folder. proceed complete Your credit limit increase is subject to the condition that proof of income is provided within 30 (thirty) days from the date of accepting the credit limit increase. Submission outside this period will result in the lapse of the offer.\n\nIf your proof of income is lower than the amount you disclosed, we will re-calculate your credit limit increase amount and notify you accordingly. You will only have access to the credit limit increase once proof of income is received. PROOF OF INCOME OOPS, TRY AGAIN. INCORRECT EMAIL FORMATTING

Track down the product you’re looking for in the app – save yourself a drive to the wrong store! Scan a product barcode to view the product information or seamlessly add it to your shopping list. Find your item faster using filters e.g. Country Road, size 10, vegetarian, organic, carb clever. Set your Delivery Location to see exact prices and the items available to you. Tap the cart icon in the bottom menu to see the items you’ve added to your cart. See all your active Woolworths accounts and check your available balance, amount due and credit limit. Overview Claim Covered not covered Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, retrenchment, disability or a critical illness. Partner Cover Covers you in the event of your partners death, permanent disability or a critical illness. Additional Death Cover Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your death. Additional Death Cover for Partner Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your partners death.
Effective date Benefits how to claim
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. All cover ceases at the age of 65, except death and critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) if your partner passes away, becomes permanently disabled, or is diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months starting from the date your partner is retrenched or temporarily disabled. All cover ceases at the age of 65, except death and a critical illness.
Pays R20 000 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays R20 000 cash to you or a nominated beneficiary when your partner or spouse passes away. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of the passing of your partner or spouse. •
Card Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, retrenchments, disability or a critical illness.
Loan Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, disability, retrenchment or a critical illness.
Companion Care Covers you in the event of your partners death.
Balance Protection (65+) Cover in the event of your death or a critical illness.
Partner Cover (65+) Covers you in the event of your partners death or a critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. Pays R2500 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away due to natural causes or R5000 cash if your passing is accidental. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your partner’s death. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) if your partner passes away or if your partner is diagnosed with a critical illness. If you have more than one woolies card, please use the pin for latest Card you received from Woolworths. step 2 of 3 step 1 of 3 step 3 of 3 complete setup LOGIN WITH NEW PASSCODE Offline Active now chat OR All The More Reason To join WRewards is our way of rewarding customers instantly. Get access to exclusive Woolies savings throughout the year! Savings on Woolies Favourites Every Day Get instant savings on quality staples and best-loved products. Look out for the WRewards icon in the Daily Difference, in store and online or on the Woolies app. Extra Savings, Promos & Events You may get something extra on promos – be it early access to promos, additional savings or complimentary vouchers. Best of all, some promos will be exclusive to WRewards members. Exclusive Vouchers Just For You Keep an eye out for vouchers that give you discount on items we think you’ll enjoy. WRewards Benefits MORE INFO TO GET TO VIP benefits vip exclusive The best savings at Woolies every day: 1. Savings on Woolies Favourites Get instant savings on quality staples and best-loved products. Look out for the green WRewards icon on the Woolies app, in store, online or in the Daily Difference. 2. Extra Savings, Promos & Events You may get something extra on promos - be it early access to promos, additional savings or complimentary vouchers. Best of all, some promos will be exclusive to WRewards members. 3. Exclusive Vouchers Just for You Keep an eye out for vouchers that give you discounts on items we think you’ll enjoy. WRewards Terms and Conditions apply. All The More Reason To Be A Vip The more you shop, the more you are rewarded. Our VIPs get: A welcome voucher of R75 off R350 on your next shop A 10% off birthday voucher First access to events Exclusive VIP surprise offers like 40% off 40 destinations with Emirates To get to VIP status, spend R30 000 or more, annually. CALCULATION OF STATUS LEVEL Your annual spend will be calculated from the first Monday of each Woolworths financial year. This commences at the end of June or beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 months later. You will be eligible for an upgrade in status level every month of the year. Downgrades only take place once, annually at the beginning of July, and are based on your spend during the previous 12 months. We are entitled to adjust the spend thresholds (they are adjusted annually), the number of status levels or the rewards at any stage without notification. LINK it NOW Can\'t find a participating store close to you? Call 0861 50 20 20 to arrange for delivery. This Virtual temporary In-Store Card (temp store card) is valid for 30 days. Your temp store card can only be used for in-store purchases and not on-line purchases. Your temp store card will be removed after your first in-store purchase with your plastic Store Card Unfortunately, you will not be able to pay your account in-store using a virtual card. Online payments, like EFT, are available. The Woolworths Virtual Temp Store Card is currently being trialed in the Western Cape and will only be usable within Western Cape Woolies Stores. You have been selected to enjoy this new feature. Feedback can be given at appfeedback@woolworths.co.za. For WRewards we have provided you with a digital WRewards card, accessible by tapping the WRewards icon. Scan this upfront, before your shopping and payment, to get great rewards and benefits. 24-Hour Shopping Enjoy 24-hour shopping at www.woolworths.co.za or in the Woolies App.
Up to 55 Days Interest Free As long as you pay your account in full on or before the due date, no interest will be charged.
Additional Cards Get up to 8 additional cards for your family at no extra cost. Purchases made with these cards will be billed to your account.
Peace of Mind Your peace of mind is important to us, so we offer you optional Comprehensive Balance Protection.
Mobile Self Service (MSS) Apply for limit increases||Access your Woolies vouchers||View your available funds and account info||Access your monthly statements
Revolving Personal Loan We offer optional Balance Protection to cover you for death, retrenchment, critical illness and disability. Find out about your options.
Access Available Funds Do a draw down in the Woolies app or call us on 0861 50 20 20.
Mobile Self Service (MSS) Apply for limit increases||Access your Woolies vouchers||View your available funds and account info||Access your monthly statements
Reward Yourself As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers.
Get More Back Everywhere 2% back in quarterly vouchers on spend inside Woolworths.
Pay for Fuel Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get 0.75% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers.
Peace of Mind We offer optional Balance Protection that benefits you or your loved ones in the event of your death, retrenchment, critical illness or disablility. Find out more.
Budget Facility Make larger purchases by using the budget facility. Funds from your straight account can be allocted to your budget facility so you can spread the payment of R300 or more over 6 to 60 months.
Free Additional Cards Up to 8 additional cards for your family or friends, at no extra cost.
Medical and Legal Assistance Provides you and your immediate family with Assistance Services, when all travelling together on a journey outside your country of residence for a duration to 90 days.
Shop Anywhere Your Woolworths Credit Card is internationally recognised and accepted at 29 million merchants around the world, wherever you see the Visa sign.
Get More Back Everywhere 1% back in quarterly vouchers on all purchases outside of Woolworths and fuel purchases when paying with your card (excludes EFT). Ts&Cs apply.
Pay for Fuel Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get up to 1% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers.
Reward Yourself As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers.
Peace of Mind We offer optional Balance Protection that benefits you or your loved ones in the event of your death, retrenchment, critical illness or disablility.
Budget Facility Make larger purchases by using the budget facility. Funds from your straight account can be allocated to your budget facility so you can spread the payment of R300 or more over 6 to 60 months.
Free Additional Cards Up to 8 additional cards for your family or friends, at no extra cost.
Medical and Legal Assistance Provides you and your immediate family with Assistance Services, when all travelling together on a journey outside your country of residence for a duration to 90 days.
Store Card Shop Woolies Food, Fashion, Beauty and Home all on one card.
Qualifying Criteria Be 18 years of age, or older Have a valid RSA ID Number Earn in excess of R2,000 per month
Card Collection When collection your Store Card, make sure you bring the following: Valid South African ID Latest three payslips or the last three months\' bank statements.
Gold Credit Card Get 2% back on all Woolies purchases when you pay with your card
Be 18 years of age, or older Have a valid RSA ID Number Earn in excess of R3,000 per month
Valid South African ID Provide your latest payslip or bank statements Utility bill or original bank statement dates within the last three months, as proof of residence.
Black Credit Card The most rewarding way to shop at Woolies.
Be 18 years of age, or older Have a valid RSA ID Number Earn in excess of R3,000 per month
A valid RSA ID number Latest three payslips or the last three months\' bank statements Utility bill or original bank statement dated within the last three months, as proof of residence
Personal Loan Access funds again and again
Be 18 years of age, or older Have a valid RSA ID Number Earn in excess of R2,000 per month Latest payslip or the last one months\' bank statements Have a bank account in your name
Card Benefits
Automatic Rewards As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers. Make a Difference Shift make a difference to the additional benefits You\'re in Control Take charge of your budget. You decide how much to pay: whether you pay the full instalment, half of the outstanding balance or the full balance on your account. Easy to Manage Convenience all the way. Shop food, fashion, beauty and home and pay utility bills or buy airtime. Also use your card at any Woolies Foodstops at selected Engen.
Get More Back at Woolies 2% back in quarterly vouchers on all your Woolies spend when you pay with your Woolies card. Cash When You Need It Use your Woolworths Credit Card to draw cash at any ATM displaying the Visa logo, worldwide. Automatic Basic Travel Insurance Get basic travel insurance if you are under the age of 75 and purchase an international airline ticket using your card. Lost Card Protection Lost card protection covers you against the fraudulent use of both primary and secondary cards.
Get Back More with Woolies Black 3% back in quarterly vouchers on all Woolies purchases when you PAY with your Woolies Credit Card. Free Taste Magazine Get your free TASTE magazine voucher monthly 2 Free Woolies Coffees Get 2 Free Woolies coffee or tea vouchers monthly Free Online Delivery Get free delivery when you shop Woolworths online or in the app and pay with your Woolies card.
Benefits Get Up to R120 000 With a Woolies Personal Loan you can get up to R120 000 cash in your bank account within 48 hours of approval. Access Funds You\'ve Already Paid Back Make use of the funds you\'ve already paid back. You can also apply to increase your limit at any time. Easy Payments Pay by a monthly debit order, at any Woolworths store, deposit into any Absa bank branch, or by Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT). Up to 60 Months to Repay Flexible repayment terms of up to 60 months and flexibility to make additional payments or settle early.
More Benefits Gold Black
Account In Arrears Amount Due Amount Overdue Total Amount Due Next Payment Due Balance At Statement Date Current Balance Available Funds Credit Limit Information Payment Option Header 4 ways we make your life easier You can pay your woolworths credit card account in any of the following ways Account Options Withdraw \nFunds
Funds available for you to use. Balance as at the current date This is the total amount of credit offered to you by Woolies. The total amount due, is the total of that months due amount plus any previous over due amounts. This is the date the Total Amount Due is to be paid by.
Account in arrears is when the minimum payment due is not paid in full by the due date. This is the minimum amount that is due for the payment, by the due date for that month. The amount that is outstanding from the previous billing due date The total amount due, is the total of that months due amount plus any previous over due amounts. This is the date the Total Amount Due is to be paid by. Balance as at the date when you are billed. Balance as at the current date Funds available for you to use. This is the total amount of credit offered to you by Woolies. silver credit card

Welcome to the world of Woolies. It’s the next level in shopping, rewards and financial services. Get inspired with the newest products and trends, find items in store and shop your favourites anytime, anywhere. Instantly save more. Sign up for WRewards on your phone, and access your virtual card, vouchers and promotions on the go. Access all your Woolworths financial products right here. Please try again later. Please let our operator know you will be using your temporary card and when prompted for payment, present the bar code to the scanner in the same way as a voucher. To use your temp store card in store, please take along your South African ID every time you want to shop with your temp card. Your temp store card cannot be used at Engen service stations. If you have issues using you temporary card please contact Woolworths financial services at 0861 50 20 20 or by email at queries@wfs.co.za.
